mapper.select: SELECT UL.*, L.LV_NAME, IU.NAME, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM LEAVE L JOIN USAGE_LV UL ON (L.LV_CODE = UL.LV_CODE) JOIN IAG_USER IU ON (UL.USER_NO = IU.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (IU.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE IU.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE
SELECT * FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'ALV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE
SELECT * FROM USAGE_LV UL JOIN LEAVE L ON (UL.LV_CODE = L.LV_CODE) WHERE UL.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND UL.LV_CODE LIKE 'LV%' AND UL.LV_END < SYSDATE
